page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: {EDUCATION} St.Peter's Primary School is the first school we go to from age 5 to 11.Unfortunately the school is split into 2 sites with the infants half a mile away.We are the oldest children.We go to school from 9:00 am to 3:30 pm.Our lessons include Maths, Topic Work linked to the B.B.C. Computer,a recent addition to Junior Schools.For our Sports Day we have 4 house teams.We have school football, netball and rounders teams.Dinners are self-service.We have 10 points,4 points MUST be used for protein.The Junior Department has 7 teachers and the Infants 4 teachers with 1 headteacher.There are 300 children in the schools.A new school is being built this year and then we will all be together.The new building will have all facilities inside including toilets.At present they are outside.
